name: ZE?T Riddle
description:
what it is?
ze?t riddle is a psychodelic online adventure made of a hundred and one riddles...
it gripped the souls of thousands of jaywalkers over the last years...
join them or leave while you still can.

the idea of the game is simple... go back to the main page and click ze?t to enter the riddle...
you will be transfered to the first level of ze?t and your task will be to find another one...
and then another one...

if it all sounds too easy... just try it.

what do i need to play?
to play ze?t you need nothing but your pc and internet connection.

to finish it you may need a few more things, like:

time
ze?t is addictive and time-consuming. have that in mind before you start.
cancel your meetings for next year, take a holiday, say goodbye to your partner...

fact: some people needed years to finish the game, some needed years just to give up...

intenet browser
as the game lives in the web environment you play it in your web browser.

google chrome, firefox, and modern edge are browsers we recommend to play ze?t.
some browsers and versions may be found to be to cooperate - no music, no transparent pictures, etc...
if you run into a technical issue, report it in the official forum or discord.
graphic editor
no, paint brush is not enough. to solve some riddles you will need adobe photoshop or gimp...

google.com
google.com is essential in ze?t. you will use it many times on your way to destiny...

in some of the first 10 riddles you will notice a google search bar below the picture...
that indicates that the riddle requires some web search to be performed...
remember that after no. 10 you will never be told again when to use it...

and after all, trust me - you will honestly be able to add 'advanced web searching' into your personal cv.

calmness
take a deep breath, count to ten then start again...

it's all about fun!
